resources:
NetworkConnect
This sample demonstrates how to connect to the network and fetch raw HTML using HttpsURLConnection. AsyncTask is used to perform the fetch on a background thread.
Welcome to Network Connect! Click FETCH to fetch the first 500 characters of raw HTML from www.baidu.com.
Fetch Clear Connection error. Fetch cancelled.
Demonstration of using RecyclerView with a LinearLayoutManager and GridLayoutManager to create a vertical list. Tap \"SHOW LOG\" to view elements as they are bound to their ViewHolder. The log also displays elements that you tap.
